snippet: An impeachment committee investigated 5 of 14 charges against Shirani Bandaranayake and found her guilty of three of them, all related to misuse of power and unexplained wealth.
lead_paragraph: An impeachment committee investigated 5 of 14 charges against Shirani Bandaranayake and found her guilty of three of them, all related to misuse of power and unexplained wealth.

headline.seo: Chief Justice in Sri Lanka Is Found Unfit for Office by Panel
headline.main: Chief Justice in Sri Lanka Found Unfit
headline.print_headline: Chief Justice In Sri Lanka Found Unfit
